testcase.classname: Confirm whether visa is required to visit UK
testcase.name: Country(B) and Tourism
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the UKBA website..............................................passed When I provide nationality of "Russia"......................................passed And I click on the Continue button..........................................passed And I select "tourism" as reason for coming to the UK.......................passed And I click on the Continue button..........................................passed And I state I am not travelling or visiting a partner or family.............passed And I click on the Continue button..........................................passed Then I will be informed "You'll need a visa to come to the UK" or "You’ll usually need a visa to come to the UK".passed
